summary.blockquote: WARNINGWarning: This directive is marked as obsolete in the specification: all mixed content is now blocked if it can't be autoupgraded.

remarks.para: The HTTP Content-Security-Policy (CSP) block-all-mixed-content directive prevents loading any assets over HTTP when the page uses HTTPS.

All mixed content resource requests are blocked, including both active and passive mixed content.
This also applies to iframe documents, ensuring the entire page is mixed content-free.

blockquote.para:
Note: The {{CSP("upgrade-insecure-requests")}} directive is evaluated before block-all-mixed-content.
If the former is set, the latter does nothing, so set one directive or the other â€“ not both, unless you want to force HTTPS on older browsers that do not force it after a redirect to HTTP.
